title: CNBC Daily Open: U.S. markets rise on tech rebound, while 'Takaichi trade' lifts Japanese stocks
summary_full: U.S. markets closed higher overnight as Big Tech stocks mostly rebounded, with Oracle jumping 9.6% and Microsoft advancing 3.1%.
summary_public: U.S. markets closed higher overnight as Big Tech stocks mostly rebounded, with Oracle jumping 9.6% and Microsoft advancing 3.1%.
